text: I think a call expression should take precedence over a typing expression, which IIRC is achievable by reordering the `hi def link` statements in the plugin, and that would have `::typeof(g)` not be highlighted as a type

text: the worst thing about vim is that we have to rely on the 3 poor sons of bitches in the world who have the time, inclination, and mental resiliance to suffer through both vimscript and regex to do everything for us

text: I might try to fix it one day. But, I got tired of writing highlighting parsers after contributing to the CodeMirror one (for it to only half-work) some time ago.
